summary: "Dumbo" (2019) is an adventure film directed by Tim Burton, based on the 1941 animated Disney classic. It tells the story of a circus family and a baby elephant with huge ears who can fly. The cast includes Colin Farrell and Michael Keaton. Plans for the live-action adaptation began in 2014, and filming took place in 2017 in England. The movie was released in 2019 and made over $350 million worldwide. Critics had mixed feelings about it, but praised the actors. It was Tim Burton's final Disney film due to disagreements with the studio.
title: Dumbo (2019 film)
